message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CC, cs.DS, cs.DM, cs.AI. 

The paper deals with the problem of learning boolean functions, which is a central topic in machine learning and falls under the category of "Learning" (cs.LG). The specific focus on learning DNF formulas and halfspaces suggests that the paper may also be relevant to "Computational Complexity" (cs.CC) and "Data Structures and Algorithms" (cs.DS). The use of probabilistic distributions and the analysis of the fraction of correctly classified points suggests that the paper may also be relevant to "Discrete Mathematics" (cs.DM) and "Artificial Intelligence" (cs.AI).
